traceability.evidence: • CLI supports `--update` and `--yes` flags (parseOptions and bin/dry-aged-deps.js). • printOutdated branches into update mode and invokes updatePackages when updateMode=true. • updatePackages logs the list of packages, prompts (using readline) when skipConfirmation=false, backs up package.json, writes updates with 2-space indent, and logs "Run 'npm install'…". • Tests in test/printOutdated.update.test.js cover safe updates + backup creation + summary + install prompt and skip-confirm flow. • Tests in printOutdated.updatePromptAbort.test.js cover preview and abort. • Tests in printOutdated.updateBackupError.test.js cover graceful backup‐error handling. • No failing tests; code and tests implementing all REQ-* requirements from prompts/011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE.md
traceability.notes: All acceptance criteria for auto-update mode have concrete implementation and are exercised by tests; functionality for preview, confirmation, backup, write, summary, post-update prompt, and error handling is in place.
